attributes.action: Stop the "redesign" at Weston's A&E use the money to reopen the A&E 24hrs a day
attributes.background: The A&E department has had a number of "redesigns" over the last few years. The A&E has been closed now for over 100 days which was meant to be a temporary closure. we are asking the government to step in and have the money reinvested in doctors and nurses to reopen the A&E!

rejection.details:
The operation of Weston General Hospital is a matter for Weston Area Health NHS Trust. 

You may wish to contact them here: http://www.waht.nhs.uk/en-GB/About-The-Trust/Contact-Us/
